title: Mastering Pair Trading with Risk-Aware Recurrent Reinforcement Learning. (arXiv:2304.00364v1 [q-fin.CP])
abstract: Although pair trading is the simplest hedging strategy for an investor to eliminate market risk, it is still a great challenge for reinforcement learning (RL) methods to perform pair trading as human expertise.
